name: Test Takeover Fails with Nonsensical Body
description: Takeover with syntactically valid but nonsensical body should fail
descriptionHtml: Takeover with syntactically valid but nonsensical body should fail
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected 400/404 for nonsensical body, got 201: 
assert 201 in (400, 404)
 +  where 201 = <Response [201]>.status_code

labels.name: story
labels.value: Takeover fails because of nonsensical body

items.statusDetails:
AssertionError: Expected 400/404 for nonsensical body, got 201: 
assert 201 in (400, 404)
 +  where 201 = <Response [201]>.status_code

AssertionError: assert 401 == 201
 +  where 401 = <Response [401]>.status_code
 +    where <Response [401]> = activate('Bearer ***REDACTED***', 'NBLTZN40C60X000Y', 'MOCKSP04')
 +      where 'MOCKSP04' = <dynaconf.base.LazySettings object at 0x7f0da5db2520>.service_provider_id
 +        where <dynaconf.base.LazySettings object at 0x7f0da5db2520> = secrets.debtor_service_provider
